name: Time Calculator - Hours Work & Time Between
description: Time Calculator app makes calculations of time simple and fast. You can get duration in hours, minutes, and seconds between two times or add/subtract a number of hours, minutes, or seconds from a time. It supports both 12-hour and 24-hour time format.    Calculators supported by the Time Calculator app:  - Simple Calculator - Age Calculator - Date Calculator - Week Number Calculator - Percentage Calculator - Tip Calculator - Unit Converter
